Segment.name: PAL
Segment.comment: To identify the type and physical attributes of the pallet, and, gross weight, gross volume, and height of the load and the pallet

Field.name: PalletTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of pallet

Field.name: PalletTiers
Field.comment: The number of layers per pallet

Field.name: PalletBlocks
Field.comment: The number of pieces (cartons) per layer on the pallet

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: UnitWeight
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight per unit

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: GrossWeightPerPack
Field.comment: Numeric value of gross weight per pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: GrossVolumePerPack
Field.comment: Numeric value of gross volume per pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode4
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container
